biotools.summary: IGUANA is a graph neural network built for colon biopsy screening. IGUANA represents a whole-slide image (WSI) as a graph built with nodes on top of glands in the tissue, each node associated with a set of interpretable features. The output of the pipeline is explainable, indicating glands and features that contribute to a WSI being predicted as abnormal.
